readable.title: 488089932_c3a5fa4140
readable.content: A girl is hula hooping on a sidewalk in New York . A little girl in brown is playing with two hula-hoops . a young girl uses two hula hoops . Girl sticks tongue out while hula hooping with two hoops Young boy with tongue out hula hooping with two hula hoops in a crowded area , man in blue shirt stands behind him .
